ProcessListDelegate.py¶

Code author: Marc-Andre Gardner

Created on:2009-12-03
class LSD_inputGUI.src.controller.ProcessListDelegate.ProcessListDelegate(parent, windowObject)[source]¶

This class is responsible of controlling the user interaction with a QTableView.(treeTab.processesList and simTab.tableView in this case).

calculateListWidth()[source]¶

Calculate pixel width of largest item in drop-down list.

Returns:Int.
commitAndCloseEditor()[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s commitAndCloseEditor method.

createEditor(parent, option, index)[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s createEditor method. Creates the widget when a user double click and item of the QTableView.

Parameters:
  • parent – Parent of the new widget.
  • option (Not used) –
  • index (PyQt4.QtCore.QModelIndex) – Index for the creation.
Returns:

PyQt4.QtGui.QLineEdit | PyQt4.QtGui.QComboBox.
setEditorData(editor, index)[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s setEditorData method. Sets the widget’s data after createEditor has created it.

Parameters:
  • editor (PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget) – Widget to set.
  • index (PyQt4.QtCore.QModelIndex) – Index of the widget.
setModelData(editor, model, index)[source]¶

Overrides QItemDelegate’s setModelData method. Sets the model data after a user interacts with the editor.

Parameters:
  • editor (PyQt4.QtGui.QWidget) – Widget that contains the data.
  • model (PyQt4.QtCore.QAbstractItemModel) – Item where to put data.
  • index (PyQt4.QtCore.QModelIndex) – Which index to put data.
